src/styles/content-strategy.css.content: :root { --fase-1-primary: var(--accent-primary); --fase-1-secondary: var(--madfam-yellow-light); --fase-1-accent: var(--madfam-yellow-dark); --fase-2-primary: var(--accent-tertiary);
